focus_zone_1: Students frequently resort to guessing, especially on questions lacking detailed explanations.
focus_zone_2: Number series, prefixes, and reasoning questions are proving challenging for many students.
focus_zone_3: Despite strengths in foundational science, cell biology concepts are not consistently understood.
action_plan_1: Incorporate worked examples with step-by-step solutions and clear explanations for all problem types.
action_plan_2: Dedicate specific class time to number series, prefixes, and reasoning exercises, emphasizing strategies for approaching these questions.
action_plan_3: Reinforce cell biology through varied methods, such as visual aids, real-world examples, and hands-on activities.

focus_zone_1: Students struggle with applying learned concepts to answer questions, often resorting to guessing.
focus_zone_2: Unit conversions and properties of matter are proving difficult for a notable portion of the class.
focus_zone_3: A lack of conceptual understanding seems to be the root cause of many incorrect answers.
action_plan_1: Incorporate more problem-solving activities that explicitly connect concepts to real-world scenarios.
action_plan_2: Dedicate additional class time to practicing unit conversions, emphasizing dimensional analysis and providing varied examples.
action_plan_3: Implement regular concept checks to ensure foundational principles are grasped before moving to more complex applications.

focus_zone_1: Students are guessing frequently, particularly in physics and biology.
focus_zone_2: The work-energy theorem and laws of motion are proving difficult for students to grasp.
focus_zone_3: Aerobic respiration and related life processes are not well understood.
action_plan_1: Incorporate more low-stakes quizzes to encourage thoughtful attempts over guessing.
action_plan_2: Dedicate additional class time to demonstrate real-world applications of the work-energy theorem and laws of motion.
action_plan_3: Use visual aids and interactive models to explain the steps and significance of aerobic respiration.
